import React, {useContext} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { FaHeart } from "react-icons/fa"; import { AuthContext } from '../store/context/AuthContext'; const MovieItem=({original_title, overview, release_date, poster_path, vote_average, id, director})=>{ const {user}=useContext(AuthContext) const addToFavourites=()=>{} return (
{user&& }

{original_title}

{director}

{overview} More
Rank: <>{vote_average}
Release Date: {release_date}
) } export default MovieItem
